articles.title: Drake Maye now odds-on favorite for NFL MVP after Matthew Stafford struggles
articles.description:
Maye leapfrogged Stafford across several sportsbooks after the Rams QB struggled on Monday Night Football.

The post Drake Maye now odds-on favorite for NFL MVP after Matthew Stafford struggles appeared first on Boston.com.
